levels.description: Immediately obtains 1 Clockwork Fowlbeast. Clockwork Fowlbeasts gain <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK and will prioritize attacking the heaviest enemies. Clockwork Fowlbeast attacks will <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> targets for 1 second
